EmailTemplate.name: New Case Assignment
EmailTemplate.subject: New Case Assignment: {!ClientCase__c.ClientCaseName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear [Counselor Name],
This message is to inform you that the case "[Case Name]" has been assigned to you, effective [Date].
Case Details:
Client Name: [Client Name]
Reason for Seeking Assistance: [Brief description of client needs]
Action Required:
Please log in to the system and review the case details, and contact the client to schedule an initial meeting at your earliest convenience to complete an initial assessment and start action plan.
Please let your manager know if you have any questions or require further assistance. We are confident that you will provide excellent care and support to this client.
Sincerely,
The [Housing Agency Name] Team
